Customer message: How can I contact your customer support team for assistance?

Customer message: How do I create a new quote in your CPQ application?
Our response: Creating a new quote is simple! Log in to your account and navigate to the configuration section. From there, you can click on the "Create New Quote" button and follow the prompts to fill in the necessary details for your quote.

Customer message: Can I customize the quote template to match my company's branding?
Our response: Yes, you can! Our CPQ application allows you to customize the quote templates to reflect your company's branding and style. You can easily upload your logo, choose colors, and add custom fields to ensure that your quotes are consistent with your brand identity.

Customer message: Is it possible to add discounts or promotions to a quote?
Our response: Absolutely! Our CPQ application provides robust discounting capabilities. You can apply discounts based on various criteria such as Package name, zone, for entire quote even you can apply discount to specific Part Number. This flexibility ensures that you can offer competitive pricing while maximizing profitability.

Customer message: How can I collaborate with my team members on a quote?
Our response: Collaboration is key, and our CPQ application makes it easy for you to work together with your team members. You can invite team members to collaborate on a quote, assign roles and permissions, and track changes in real-time. You can also transfer the ownership to other team members! This ensures that everyone is on the same page and contributes to the success of the quote.

Customer message: Can I track the status of a quote and follow up with customers accordingly?
Our response: Absolutely! Our CPQ application provides visibility into the status of each quote, from creation to acceptance. You can track when a quote is viewed by the customer, follow up with automated reminders, and monitor the progress towards closing the deal. This proactive approach helps you stay organized and responsive to customer needs.

Customer message: How can I configure a product with specific features and options in your CPQ application?
Our response: Configuring a product is easy with our CPQ application! Simply navigate to the Configure section, where you'll find a user-friendly interface that allows you to select from a range of features and options to customize your product according to your preferences and requirements. With our new enhancements, different ways are introduced for fast and seamless experience for you.

Customer message: Can I create pricing approval rules to ensure accurate pricing in the CPQ application?
Our response: Absolutely! Our CPQ application provides powerful pricing rule capabilities that allow you to create and customize pricing rules based on various factors such as product attributes, customer segments, and volume discounts. This ensures that pricing is accurate and consistent across all quotes.

Our response: Yes, our CPQ application supports integration with third-party systems for pricing data. You can seamlessly integrate with others systems, Databases, or other external sources to ensure that you have access to up-to-date and accurate pricing information within the application.

Customer message: Can you tell me about internal technical security configuration of CPQ?
Our response: Thank you for your interest! For security related questions, please contact CPQ Sales team.

Customer message: I am getting unauthorized error, what should be my next step?
Our response: I apologize for the inconvenience. Seems like you don't have proper permission to access the application. Please contact Security.Sales@team.

Customer message: I am unable to access Order details due to approval issue? Please suggest.
Our response: I apologize for the inconvenience. Looks like you have breached a threshold check and needs approval. Kindly request approval and once approval is provided, you will be able to access Order details.

Customer message: Could you give me some details regarding approval/Threshold rules in pricing?
Our response: Thank you for your interest! Our CPQ application includes built-in validation checks and approval workflows to ensure that quotes comply with pricing policies and guidelines. You can define rules, thresholds, and approval processes to enforce compliance and prevent unauthorized discounts or deviations from pricing guidelines. This helps maintain pricing integrity and profitability. Once you define rules, thresholds or approval and Order breaches the limit then Approval is required.
